thread.title: Virender Sehwag announces retirement from international cricket
thread.title_full: Virender Sehwag announces retirement from international cricket - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Virender Sehwag announces retirement from international cricket
text: 20 Oct 2015Veteran batsman Virender Sehwag has formally announced his retirement from international cricket, more than two-and-a-half years on from his last appearance for India. On his 37th birthday today, the 'Sultan of Multan' made the announcement via Twitter, with a crisp message that said he would no longer play in the IPL either. Â»
